comments: Equals 0.176777... = 5*sqrt(2)/40, which is a tenth of sum_{n = 1 .. infinity} n^2*binomial(2n, n)/8^n [D. H. Lehmer, Am. Math. Monthly 92 (1985) 449]. [From _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 04 2009]
links: Ivan Panchenko, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Albert Einstein, Quantum theory of monatomic ideal gases (coefficient appears as 0.1768 in the first formula)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
